name: Pre-Party Glow Vitamin C Skincare Trio
about: What it is:This trio of vitamin C-boosted bestsellers is the perfect pre-party prep with everything you need for visibly bright, hydrated, makeup-ready skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dullness, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Dark Circles.Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Make every day luminous with this brightening, makeup-prepping trio. First, use Banana Bright Face Serum for visibly brighter, bouncier-looking skin. Then, quickly illuminate and deliver up to 24 hours of hydration with Banana Bright+ Instant Glow Moisturizer. Follow with Banana Bright+ Eye Crème to visibly diminish dark circles..This Set Contains:- 0.5 oz/ 15 mL Banana Bright Vitamin C Serum.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.

Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Banana Bright Vitamin C Serum:.-Apply evenly to face and neck daily. .-This product contains a high percentage of vitamin C; patch test a small amount on forearm..-PHA Sunburn Alert: Cover areas where AHAs/PHAs have been applied with sunscreen, or protective clothing prior to sun exposure, and for up to a week afterwards. ..Banana Bright+ Instant Glow Moisturizer:.-Apply evenly to face and neck daily. .-Gently massage in an upward, circular motion. .-Avoid contact with eyes. ..Banana Bright+ Eye Crème: .-Gently apply to the under-eye area using your ring finger. .-Wear alone or under concealer to improve and extend wear. .-For the best experience and results, close jar tightly and store in a cool, dark, dry place below 25° C or 77° F. ..Set Precautions: .-Use as directed. .-For external use only. .-Do not use if you’re allergic to vitamin C or any other ingredient in these formulas. .-If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

reviews.review_text: I love the glow which i get after using the moisturizer. The only bad part is you can feel the stickiness on the face after applying moisturizer. But it is worth underneath the makeup. I got this set on sale and i love the eye cream and moisturizer the MOST. It gives the instant glow and moisturizer to the gave. Iam getting so many compliments. It m it

reviews.review_title: I will be staying away from OLENHENRIKSEN products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: HUGE RASH/ ITCHYINESS on my cheeks down to my neck. It is excruciating.   I have used their products in the past and they were great. Something has changed within 2 years.  (35, white, female, fair skin)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Effective set of products, especially worth it on sale! Haven’t had any reaction like other reviews have mentioned. The vitamin C serum’s texture feels nice and not sticky like some other vitamin C serums can be.

reviews.review_title: Ne recommande pas pour la peau sèche
reviews.review_text: Ne recommande pas du tout, dit que c’est pour type de  peau sèche et après quelques jours d’essais, ma peau est encore deux fois plus sèche, n’hydrate pas du tout et n’aide vraiment pas pour la peau sèche, au contraire, il est très asséchant  Est très

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would not recommend this product it made my eyes swell up and my cheeks were swollen as well. Try different vitamin C products don't bother with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this line. I get so many compliments on my skin.. I feel so awake and glowy when I use this trio!
Not for me ! Allergic reaction all over my face red and bumps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very bad, gave me an allergic reaction that turned into hives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good. I really like the under eye cream. I have dark circles, it is helping to brighten and my concealer goes on smoothly.
Not a good product at all. Not worth it look for other alternatives

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only line that works for my sensitive skin. I was not paid to write this review! I simply love the products. the scent is gentle and pleasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Banana Bright line is one of my all time favorites--gives me this insane, INSTANT glow that I'm absolutely in love with, while hydrating and treating all of my skin concerns.  I already loved the serum and the eye cream and was so excited to try the new moisturizer at an amazing deal.  definitely recommend this set to people who have been wanting to try more from the line or who need to stock up bc this deal is TOO good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had a bad reaction to this product and I want to share my experience. I do have sensitive skin but have tried other Olehenriksen products and liked them. However, once I put these products on my face, it started burning slightly. Sometimes that happens and goes away. In this care, by mid-day both my cheeks where I had applied the product were bright red, swollen, numb and had rough bump texture. I immediately washed it off at that point but my skin is still not the same 2 days after. I haven’t had an experience like that with skincare before, even with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!   I bought this kit for myself and my husband because we used to love it, and I literally woke up with hive like symptoms all over my face, swollen eyes, and it itches SO bad. I even have a rash all over my cheeks. I washed my face immediately and it has felt like horrible all day- I am currently still having symptoms 8+ hours after washing my face and taking a Benadryl.   Apparently they changed their formula and a lot people are having an allergic reaction to it.   DO NOT BUY 0 STARS!!!!
